title: Lotus Bar and Gallery
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, International, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Set in a restored colonial era shophouse, a bar and restaurant is downstairs and an art gallery/ cinema is upstairs where regular events are held. Approximately half the menu is vegetarian or vegan; vegan choices include mushroom risotto, mezze platter, burgers and others. A vegetarian pizza can be made vegan by asking for no cheese.
